programme.sub-title: Nightmare Tenants: Get Out of My House.
programme.desc: Alex is hit with a £7,000 bill after his tenant is found to have been running a business from his property. Elsewhere, property developer Jon calls in an eviction specialist to rid a disused tram station of squatters, and . Vicki is surprised to find out that a tenant has stopped paying rent and moved in a sub-tenant.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights of the new housemates' first full day in the Big Brother house. The celebrities may be used to staring down a lens as part of their working lives, but Big Brother's 24-hour spy-like devices are not the TV, movie and paparazzi cameras they are used to facing. It remains to be seen who is playing up for the benefit of the viewing public and who is taking a more laid-back approach to their public incarceration.(n)

programme.title: In Therapy
programme.desc: The former Big Brother contestant, famous for her crazy outbursts, temper tantrums and `Who is she?' catchphrase, undergoes a series of intensive on-camera therapy sessions with psychotherapist Mandy Saligari. She is keen to leave behind her childlike persona for which she has become known, but to do this she must confront her demons, touching on her battles with anorexia and depression, and the time she was admitted to a psychiatric unit at an early age.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, including celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber. Twenty years later, the dragon's deadly offspring are wreaking havoc and Quinn is part of a desperate band of humans fighting for survival when help arrives in the form of legendary dragon slayer Denton Van Zan(n)

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: Explosive action thriller starring Steven Seagal as an ex- DEA agent who comes out of retirement to take on a deadly gang of Jamaican drug-dealers terrorising Chicago(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Before Jayson Blair made headlines for his plagiarized New York Times reporting, Stephen Glass defamed the weekly current events magazine The New Republic with a series of eye-catching, entertaining, and completely fabricated stories. Now Glass' trail of lies gets the big-screen treatment in writer/director Billy Ray's Shattered Glass, featuring Hayden Christensen in the title role. The film chronicles Glass' time at the magazine in the late '90s, when his colorful coverage of a hedonistic Young Republican convention, superstar web hackers, and the circus surrounding the Bill Clinton/Monica Lewinsky scandal made him the toast of the publishing world, garnering attention from such national publications as George and Rolling Stone. Barely out of college, the eager Glass ingratiates himself with the office staff, including his mentor, managing editor Michael Kelly (Hank Azaria). But when Kelly is unceremoniously fired and replaced with editor Chuck Lane (Peter Sarsgaard), Glass' pieces come under a greater degree of scrutiny, until one in particular threatens to expose his tall tales to the rest of the world. Based in part on a Vanity Fair article by journalist Buzz Bissinger, Shattered Glass premiered at the Telluride and Toronto film festivals before its limited fall theatrical release(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Epic romantic adventure, set just prior to World War II, about an English aristocrat and the rugged drover who helps her with the cattle station she inherited(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Risky Business is the film in which 19-year-old Tom Cruise dances around his living room in his underwear. He does this to celebrate the fact that his parents have left him alone while they go on vacation. Somewhere along the line, hooker Rebecca De Mornay, fleeing her vicious pimp, hides out in the Cruise manse. Things go from bad to worse to as Cruise inadvertently drives his father's Porsche into Lake Michigan and nearly scuttles his college recruitment interview(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between an aspiring cop and his seasoned partner (and future brother-in-law) as they pursue a Miami drug lord together with the help of a savvy detective(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner make a sizzling duo in this dark and sexy adaptation of the Marvel comic. Affleck plays the blind lawyer-turned-superhero who takes on Kingpin and his rogues' gallery of villains to avenge the death of his father. Garner heats things up as the leather-clad Elektra, the daughter of a slain shipping tycoon who is out for some payback of her own(n)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: Action drama in which an old Vietnam veteran who is disillusioned with the hi-tech, by-the-book modern military, requests a posting to his old unit to see out his soldiering days. Tough and foul-mouthed, the marine sergeant puts a squadron of lazy young recruits through their paces, turning them into a well disciplined fighting unit - just in time for a hazardous rescue mission to the small Caribbean island of Grenada(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Soldier George Clooney leads a rogue squad including Mark Wahlberg and Ice Cube on a journey to find hidden Iraqi gold(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Eddie Mannix is a Hollywood 'fixer', and is part of the upcoming production starring superstar actor Baird Whitlock. When Whitlock is kidnapped, it is up to Mannix to collect his ransom and rescue him before the media finds out(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Brilliant comedy, with Marisa Tomei winning an Oscar for Best Supporting Actress, as two innocent New Yorkers are put on trial for murder in a small town and it is up to their brash Italian American cousin to save them(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Crooks are selling Witness Protection data to the crime gangs they ratted out, so detective agency boss Charlie sends his 'Angels' to solve the crime(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: James Cox directs the sleazy Hollywood murder tale Wonderland, starring Val Kilmer as legendary porn star John Holmes. Using a non-linear plot structure, the film explores different perspectives of the quadruple homicide that occurred on July 1, 1981, in the Hollywood Hills. At the lowest point of his career and the height of his drug addiction, Holmes was implicated in the murders of the Wonderland gang: Ron Launius (Josh Lucas), Billy Deverell (Tim Blake Nelson), Barbara Richardson (Natasha Gregson Wagner), and Joy Miller (Janeane Garofalo). Launius' wife, Susan (Christina Applegate), was the only survivor. Led by Detective Sam Nico (Ted Levine), the police investigation reveals a dark criminal underworld surrounding Holmes, his disapproving wife, Sharon (Lisa Kudrow), and his innocent teenage girlfriend, Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth). Eric Bogosian stars as notorious Hollywood nightclub owner Eddie Nash. Wonderland premiered at the 2003 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller in which a young woman who is half-human, half-alien goes on the rampage. Scientists have received a message from space which details the DNA structure of the alien race which has sent it, together with instructions on how to combine the alien DNA with that of a human being. Now an experiment is underway to do just this - until the little girl at the heart of the experiment breaks out of the laboratory and goes on the run. Growing up at an incredible speed, Sil is also developing some quite alien powers and presents a serious threat to the human population. A team of trackers - and assassins - has been despatched to eliminate her, but will they succeed before it is too late?(n)

programme.title: Bride of Chucky
programme.desc: The most recent sequel to Childsplay, the movie about the killer doll Chucky. He's brought back to life and joined by a girlfriend - and together they go on a killing spree. The first three movies in the series took themselves seriously, but Bride Of Chucky departs from this tradition in joyful self-parody, poking fun at a few other celluloid killers along the way(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Toula and Ian are parents to a teenage daughter in this sequel that brings the entire Portokalos family together for another huge wedding(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: Paul Newman racked up an Oscar reprising his role from "The Hustler", a pool shark who takes a hotshot under his wing(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: A talented young baseball player, Miguel 'Sugar' Santos, is brought from a US training ground in his native Dominican Republic to play for a minor league team in Iowa. But he soon finds that his pursuit of the ever-elusive American dream might well remain unfulfilled(n)

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Michael Cera stars in this unconventionally structured, inventive and comic paean to the alternate universe of manga and computer gaming. The movie is based on an acclaimed series of graphic novels by Canadian cartoonist Bryan Lee O'Malley, and is directed by British film-maker Edgar Wright, here making his Hollywood debut. Computer game fanatic Scott Pilgrim is the bass player with Toronto band Sex Bob-omb. He shares his flat with his slightly-out-of-control gay friend Wallace Wells, and courts a little controversy by dating 17-year-old schoolgirl Knives Chau. However, theirs is a fairly platonic relationship, and one he's prepared to ditch the moment he sets eyes on the woman of his dreams: Ramona Flowers. But if Scott wants to capture the impossibly cool New Yorker's heart, he must first defeat her former lovers, the Seven Evil Exes, in video game end-level-style combat. So he embarks on a kinetic, romantic quest, largely conducted within his own head, replete with slapstick violence, impressive effects and witty retorts(n)

programme.title: As Above, So Below
programme.desc: A group of young people uncover a disturbing secret when they venture into the catacombs below Paris(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick O'Connell once again battles the resurrected mummy in this sequel to the 1999 hit(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Unlucky-in-love Martha falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While Martha believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is real-life drug baron George Jung, who rose from peddling pot in the 70s to become Colombia's top cocaine connection in the US. With Penelope Cruz(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber. Twenty years later, the dragon's deadly offspring are wreaking havoc and Quinn is part of a desperate band of humans fighting for survival when help arrives in the form of legendary dragon slayer Denton Van Zan(n)

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: Explosive action thriller starring Steven Seagal as an ex- DEA agent who comes out of retirement to take on a deadly gang of Jamaican drug-dealers terrorising Chicago(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Before Jayson Blair made headlines for his plagiarized New York Times reporting, Stephen Glass defamed the weekly current events magazine The New Republic with a series of eye-catching, entertaining, and completely fabricated stories. Now Glass' trail of lies gets the big-screen treatment in writer/director Billy Ray's Shattered Glass, featuring Hayden Christensen in the title role. The film chronicles Glass' time at the magazine in the late '90s, when his colorful coverage of a hedonistic Young Republican convention, superstar web hackers, and the circus surrounding the Bill Clinton/Monica Lewinsky scandal made him the toast of the publishing world, garnering attention from such national publications as George and Rolling Stone. Barely out of college, the eager Glass ingratiates himself with the office staff, including his mentor, managing editor Michael Kelly (Hank Azaria). But when Kelly is unceremoniously fired and replaced with editor Chuck Lane (Peter Sarsgaard), Glass' pieces come under a greater degree of scrutiny, until one in particular threatens to expose his tall tales to the rest of the world. Based in part on a Vanity Fair article by journalist Buzz Bissinger, Shattered Glass premiered at the Telluride and Toronto film festivals before its limited fall theatrical release(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Epic romantic adventure, set just prior to World War II, about an English aristocrat and the rugged drover who helps her with the cattle station she inherited(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Risky Business is the film in which 19-year-old Tom Cruise dances around his living room in his underwear. He does this to celebrate the fact that his parents have left him alone while they go on vacation. Somewhere along the line, hooker Rebecca De Mornay, fleeing her vicious pimp, hides out in the Cruise manse. Things go from bad to worse to as Cruise inadvertently drives his father's Porsche into Lake Michigan and nearly scuttles his college recruitment interview(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between an aspiring cop and his seasoned partner (and future brother-in-law) as they pursue a Miami drug lord together with the help of a savvy detective(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner make a sizzling duo in this dark and sexy adaptation of the Marvel comic. Affleck plays the blind lawyer-turned-superhero who takes on Kingpin and his rogues' gallery of villains to avenge the death of his father. Garner heats things up as the leather-clad Elektra, the daughter of a slain shipping tycoon who is out for some payback of her own(n)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: Action drama in which an old Vietnam veteran who is disillusioned with the hi-tech, by-the-book modern military, requests a posting to his old unit to see out his soldiering days. Tough and foul-mouthed, the marine sergeant puts a squadron of lazy young recruits through their paces, turning them into a well disciplined fighting unit - just in time for a hazardous rescue mission to the small Caribbean island of Grenada(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Soldier George Clooney leads a rogue squad including Mark Wahlberg and Ice Cube on a journey to find hidden Iraqi gold(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Eddie Mannix is a Hollywood 'fixer', and is part of the upcoming production starring superstar actor Baird Whitlock. When Whitlock is kidnapped, it is up to Mannix to collect his ransom and rescue him before the media finds out(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Brilliant comedy, with Marisa Tomei winning an Oscar for Best Supporting Actress, as two innocent New Yorkers are put on trial for murder in a small town and it is up to their brash Italian American cousin to save them(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Crooks are selling Witness Protection data to the crime gangs they ratted out, so detective agency boss Charlie sends his 'Angels' to solve the crime(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: James Cox directs the sleazy Hollywood murder tale Wonderland, starring Val Kilmer as legendary porn star John Holmes. Using a non-linear plot structure, the film explores different perspectives of the quadruple homicide that occurred on July 1, 1981, in the Hollywood Hills. At the lowest point of his career and the height of his drug addiction, Holmes was implicated in the murders of the Wonderland gang: Ron Launius (Josh Lucas), Billy Deverell (Tim Blake Nelson), Barbara Richardson (Natasha Gregson Wagner), and Joy Miller (Janeane Garofalo). Launius' wife, Susan (Christina Applegate), was the only survivor. Led by Detective Sam Nico (Ted Levine), the police investigation reveals a dark criminal underworld surrounding Holmes, his disapproving wife, Sharon (Lisa Kudrow), and his innocent teenage girlfriend, Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth). Eric Bogosian stars as notorious Hollywood nightclub owner Eddie Nash. Wonderland premiered at the 2003 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller in which a young woman who is half-human, half-alien goes on the rampage. Scientists have received a message from space which details the DNA structure of the alien race which has sent it, together with instructions on how to combine the alien DNA with that of a human being. Now an experiment is underway to do just this - until the little girl at the heart of the experiment breaks out of the laboratory and goes on the run. Growing up at an incredible speed, Sil is also developing some quite alien powers and presents a serious threat to the human population. A team of trackers - and assassins - has been despatched to eliminate her, but will they succeed before it is too late?(n)

programme.title: Bride of Chucky
programme.desc: The most recent sequel to Childsplay, the movie about the killer doll Chucky. He's brought back to life and joined by a girlfriend - and together they go on a killing spree. The first three movies in the series took themselves seriously, but Bride Of Chucky departs from this tradition in joyful self-parody, poking fun at a few other celluloid killers along the way(n)

programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home(n)

At an orphanarium reunion, Leela runs into an old classmate, Adlai, that is now a plastic surgeon, and he gives her an operation to give her the appearance of two eyes. Leela revels in her newfound ordinariness and starts dating Adlai. Meanwhile, when Bender finds out that orphans come with a government stipend, he adopts twelve of them. Despite himself, he's a good father, but when he realizes he's losing money on the deal, he decides to get rid of them(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Camille's best friend, a singer on a Caribbean party boat, collapses on stage during a night of music and cocktails. After she dies in the policewoman's arms, the officers question the vessel's staff and on-board tourists in an effort to get to the bottom of her mysterious demise. Photographs taken on the evening offer a fuller picture of what took place, but could the answer lie in the vocalist's pre-show routine? Meanwhile, DI Poole tries his best to comfort a grieving Camille, but it soon becomes clear that sensitivity is not his strong suit. Ben Miller and Sara Martins star, with guest appearances from singer Jamelia, Dexter Fletcher (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels) and Amanda Mealing (ex-Holby City).(n)

programme.desc: A crook-turned-professional fencer drifts back into a life of crime. But just as he begins to settle into his new life, the secrets of his past resurface, and his two worlds collide violently. Drama, starring Robson Green, Arkie Whiteley, John McGlynn and Maureen Beattie.(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: An English tourist is strangled in her villa by a killer using the victim's scarf. The crime scene indicates a robbery gone wrong, but DI Poole recalls an almost identical case back in London. He grows even more suspicious when the victim's husband turns out to be crooked former colleague Doug Anderson, a name he had hoped was consigned to the past. But even though he has a watertight alibi and the team move on to further leads, Poole can't shake the notion that his old adversary is somehow involved. Ben Miller stars, with guest appearances from Neil Pearson, Ralf Little and Miller's former Primeval co-stars Hannah Spearritt and James Murray.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries

programme.desc: Joe is furious when he finds out that Dani had some older friends over to the house who drank his expensive bottle of wine, but wonders whether she is being totally honest with him about the event. When Lennox expresses admiration for her college professor Evita, Mel grows jealous of their relationship, until Evita asks to interview Mel for her latest research project. Shalita Grant guest stars alongside Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben, Tucker and Danny panic that their girlfriends could be pregnant when it turns out their stash of contraceptives have been accidentally damaged.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: When Ben forgets Emma's birthday, his attempts to organise an impromptu party fall flat. Danny and Riley come to a crossroads when they are both offered new career opportunities. Bonnie and Brad have to decide how to move forward when he returns home from his spiritual quest with a new outlook on life. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: When the Johnsons' neighbours invite them to a Sunday church service, Dre fights his instinct to say no to everything and agrees. As a result, the family members have a wonderful day and realise they should agree to things more often. Meanwhile, Jack and Diane find out they were never baptised.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre's nieces and nephews come to the neighbourhood on Halloween to go trick-or-treating, but his own children aren't happy when their boisterous cousins drop by. Dre also gets a surprise visit from his own cousin June Bug, who used to torment him when they were children.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam accidentally gets Barry kicked out of his cool group of friends, so he comes up with a plan to get his brother back in favour by convincing them he has the hacking skills to access the school's computer system to change their grades. Comedy, starring Sean Giambrone.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys' science skills are put to the test when they get a flat tyre during Leonard's surprise bachelor party weekend in Mexico. Meanwhile, the girls finally force Penny to break the news to her family that she has eloped with Leonard. Keith Carradine guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard announce that they are moving in together, prompting Sheldon to revisit 2003, a much simpler time before he had met either of them. Howard and Raj form a band to play at the comic-book store, only to fall out over musical differences.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's the day of Armstrong's hearing and Dirk is worried about Cindy's mental state. Meanwhile, Scott sets Brody up with Lisa hoping to drive a wedge between Brody and Damon, and Louis and Zack have a brief reconciliation.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Cindy is spooked when she wakes up to see DS Armstrong standing over her, and Zack finds looking after Daniel a bit overwhelming. Meanwhile, James tries to explain himself to DS Armstrong.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The tourists reach Bologna, which means a Bolognese cookery class is in order. But following their lunch with an aerial acrobatic class may not have been the greatest of ideas.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny thinks that Leonard is taking her for granted and has stopped making an effort in their relationship, so she decides to go away for a spa weekend with Amy.(n)

programme.title: Kevin Can Wait
programme.desc: Kevin and Donna's chiropractor catches them with his colleague, jeopardising their chances for a kid-free holiday. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Erinn Hayes.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess and her dad help each other with their love lives. Nick turns to Aly for help with Reagan, and Schmidt considers revealing his first name.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess prepares to tell Nick how she really feels about him. Aly helps Winston reconnect with someone important and Schmidt and Cece receive big news. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will plans to celebrate his birthday with a grown-up dinner, but his friends face a dilemma when they discover the event clashes with a more popular party. They end up gatecrashing the rival gathering, only to find that Simon's French exchange student steals the limelight.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will tries to reinvent the boys' image by taking them clubbing around London, but Simon is unsure whether to go until Carli shows an interest in the outing. When the friends arrive in the West End, their efforts to appear cool are hampered by aggressive bouncers, a tramp and some angry bus passengers.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon decides to make a new set of friends as he is depressed that the group's social world revolves around Leonard rather than himself. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette try to persuade Penny to go on a date. Comedy, guest starring LeVar Burton, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Mayim Bialik.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard faces the difficult decision of choosing between his relationship with Priya and his friendship with Penny, while Sheldon is irritated by one of Howard's magic tricks. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: The struggle for survival on the region's isolated islands, home to flightless parrots, burrowing bats, giant skinks and tree-dwelling kangaroos. The documentary reveals how the arrival of new species can upset the delicate natural balance, with disastrous consequences, and explores the human history of the region. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: How the plant-eating leaellynasaura coped with conditions in the Antarctic at a time when the continent was covered in trees and existed for half the year in warm sunshine and the other in freezing twilight. The extreme variations in temperature brought about an epic struggle for survival as creatures strove to keep one step ahead of their polar predators.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is 65 million years ago and time is fast running out for the dinosaurs. As the Cretaceous period draws to a close and massive volcanic activity poisons the air, an enormous comet is the harbinger of doom for the huge creatures and augurs a new chapter in Earth's natural history. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor heads for the city of Kochi on the south-west coast of India, where he tries his hand at a fishing technique developed in the early 15th century. He is also given a chance to take part in an evening dance performance, but fails to make any catches at the popular resort of Alappuzha. He concludes this leg of his adventure in the Maldives, braving bad weather to land a red snapper.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the world's caves, including the Lechuguilla Cave in America, which contains chambers filled with 6m-long crystals. He observes creatures in Texas and Thailand that never see daylight, and inside Deer Cave in Borneo he finds five million bats whose droppings support an entire ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: The struggle for survival on the region's isolated islands, home to flightless parrots, burrowing bats, giant skinks and tree-dwelling kangaroos. The documentary reveals how the arrival of new species can upset the delicate natural balance, with disastrous consequences, and explores the human history of the region. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Exploring the wealth of marine life that inhabits the ocean's edge, dealing with the dangers of an ever-shifting environment. David Attenborough observes nesting seabirds in east Russia, Patagonian killer whales, Newfoundland caplin fish, walruses, and Brazilian green turtles - which make their annual expedition to an island in the middle of the Atlantic to lay their eggs. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor heads for the city of Kochi on the south-west coast of India, where he tries his hand at a fishing technique developed in the early 15th century. He is also given a chance to take part in an evening dance performance, but fails to make any catches at the popular resort of Alappuzha. He concludes this leg of his adventure in the Maldives, braving bad weather to land a red snapper.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: How the plant-eating leaellynasaura coped with conditions in the Antarctic at a time when the continent was covered in trees and existed for half the year in warm sunshine and the other in freezing twilight. The extreme variations in temperature brought about an epic struggle for survival as creatures strove to keep one step ahead of their polar predators.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is 65 million years ago and time is fast running out for the dinosaurs. As the Cretaceous period draws to a close and massive volcanic activity poisons the air, an enormous comet is the harbinger of doom for the huge creatures and augurs a new chapter in Earth's natural history. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the world's caves, including the Lechuguilla Cave in America, which contains chambers filled with 6m-long crystals. He observes creatures in Texas and Thailand that never see daylight, and inside Deer Cave in Borneo he finds five million bats whose droppings support an entire ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor heads for the city of Kochi on the south-west coast of India, where he tries his hand at a fishing technique developed in the early 15th century. He is also given a chance to take part in an evening dance performance, but fails to make any catches at the popular resort of Alappuzha. He concludes this leg of his adventure in the Maldives, braving bad weather to land a red snapper.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: The struggle for survival on the region's isolated islands, home to flightless parrots, burrowing bats, giant skinks and tree-dwelling kangaroos. The documentary reveals how the arrival of new species can upset the delicate natural balance, with disastrous consequences, and explores the human history of the region. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: Outback Rangers
programme.desc: The team members protect crocodile eggs and investigate reports of prehistoric art. Documentary strand following rangers at Kakadu National Park in Australia.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: Efforts to preserve the marine life of the region, which is home to the world's richest coral reefs and an array of species, including whales, sharks, albatross and tuna. Despite millions of people relying on its fish stocks, the seas have very little protection and face various threats, with international fishing fleets taking a disastrous toll. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates.(n)

programme.title: Dino Hunt
programme.desc: Documentary following palaeontologists searching for dinosaur fossils. A team of scientists searches for the skull bones of what may be a brand new species of horned dinosaurs.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor teams up with Captain Taco Perez at Fort Lauderdale in Florida to catch a sailfish, but his expedition proves less than successful. However, his efforts finally pay off in Miami, where he finally manages to land the fish with the help of a local man with 30 years' experience. Later he heads inland to the lakes and creeks of Gemini Springs to try his hand at bowfishing from a flat-bottomed airboat, and visits the West Palm Beach Fishing Club to hunt for the bull shark - an aggressive predator that has been known to attack humans.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The nature series looks at the animals that live on some of the world's highest mountains. Cameras show gelada baboons screaming to frighten off predators in Ethiopia, demoiselle cranes struggling to migrate over the Himalayas, snow leopards hunting on the peaks of Pakistan and a wild giant panda nursing a baby in a hillside cave. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.desc: Efforts to preserve the marine life of the region, which is home to the world's richest coral reefs and an array of species, including whales, sharks, albatross and tuna. Despite millions of people relying on its fish stocks, the seas have very little protection and face various threats, with international fishing fleets taking a disastrous toll. programme.title: Bahama Blue
programme.desc: Looking at nature in the Bahamas, including creatures, plants, caves, blue holes and biological anomalies.(n)

programme.title: Dino Hunt

programme.title: Planet Ice
programme.desc: Documentary studying glaciers in Greenland, a country that is mostly covered in snow and ice regardless of the season.(n)

programme.title: For Your Eyes Only
programme.desc: James Bond races the Russians to locate a sunken spy ship that contains an important technological device that, in the wrong hands, could prove costly to the British Navy(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A grief counsellor begins to suspect foul play when the six airplane crash survivors she is tending to mysteriously begin to disappear and the truth behind the tragedy grows ever more clouded in NINE LIVES director Rodrigo Garcia's conspiratorial supernatural thriller(n)

programme.title: The Hitcher
programme.desc: Horror remake about a young couple who become embroiled in a bloody battle of wits with the psychotic hitchhiker they stop to pick up on their way home for spring break. The hitcher is a brutal serial killer who decides to set up the young driver as the fall guy for a string of horrific murders as part of a macabre game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: Up in Smoke
programme.desc: This film, while despised by critics and lovers of cinema, is cherished by fans of the comedy team, Cheech and Chong. In this wildly irreverent comedy, Man Stoner (Tommy Chong) is thrown out of his rich parent's Hollywood Hill's home and hooks up with Pedro De Pacas (Cheech Marin) the leader of a rock-and-roll band. In a van made entirely of pure marijuana, the two set out on a ride from Los Angeles to Mexico and back. Despite all of this, they still have time to enter and win a "battle-of-the-bands" contest. Up in Smoke, produced and directed by Lou Alder is Cheech and Chong's first and best film(n)

programme.title: Goldfinger
programme.desc: Beginning innocently enough with a murder, James Bond finds himself investigating Auric Goldfinger, a gold dealer who the Bank of England suspects is stockpiling huge amounts of gold bullion. However, he soon uncovers a far more sinister plot called Operation Grand Slam and has a fair bit of bowler-hat-dodging to do from Goldfinger's manservant, Oddjob(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: The Tailor of Panama
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan is a British spy banished to Panama after a series of indiscretions. Trying to win himself back into favour, he latches on to tailor Geoffrey Rush, whose wife works for the government. Rush, reluctantly blackmailed into providing intelligence, offers Brosnan increasingly lurid stories which, embellished again and sent to London, create a political incident that begins to spiral out of control in John Boorman's mordantly black comedy(n)

programme.title: GoldenEye
programme.desc: Dynamic action adventure marking Pierce Brosnan's first appearance as 007. The newly appointed M asks Bond to discover who is behind the skyjacking of an ultra-secret NATO Tiger helicopter and the destruction of a space weapons centre inside the Arctic Circle. Bond's mission takes him into the heart of Russia to penetrate the armaments mafia. Little does he realise that the assignment will bring him face to face with his past(n)

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: John Travolta shines in this adaptation of Elmore Leonard's novel about a movie-loving loan shark who pitches a story idea to a producer while collecting a debt(n)

programme.title: A View to a Kill
programme.desc: MI6 agent James Bond's latest mission is to foil the evil plan of technology mogul Max Zorin, who wants to cause an earthquake that will wipe out his competitors in Silicon Valley(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: In the Offing. A sitcom about a young pro-basketball star and his opportunistic family entourage begins with the player arriving in Atlanta, where he deals with a new city, a new team and the same old relatives who take advantage of him and his generosity(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: On the Carpet. At a charity event for an abused child, Cam's mother goes overboard detailing a story about her son's upbringing, while Uncle Julius steps up as a "talent scout" for Cam(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Meet Wally Sparks
programme.desc: Old-school comic Rodney "I get no respect" Dangerfield headlines this broad-based comedy satire of trashy '90s-style television talk-shows. He plays the title host of an afternoon show that has become so sleazy that all but his most die-hard fans have stopped watching. Studio executive Lenny Spencer (Burt Reynolds) is so disgusted, that he gives Sparks one week to improve the ratings or else. To this end, Sparks attends a special reception hosted by his arch nemesis, ultra-conservative Governor Floyd Preston (David Ogden Stiers)(n)

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: John Travolta shines in this adaptation of Elmore Leonard's novel about a movie-loving loan shark who pitches a story idea to a producer while collecting a debt(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: Stefen Fangmeier's action-packed fantasy film is set in a medieval-like society ruled by the despotic Galbatorix, abetted by his henchman Durza (Robert Carlyle). Galbatorix has exterminated the fabled Dragon Riders who threatened his reign, but a teenage boy, Eragon, discovers a surviving egg from which hatches the dragon Saphira. Unable to control her as she grows, Eragon finds guidance from village layabout Brom, who reveals himself to be the last of the Dragon Riders. The three raise a rebel army to topple Galbatorix but, at the same time, Eragon and Saphira must rescue princess Arya from Galbatorix's evil clutches(n)

programme.title: Flicka
programme.desc: A headstrong teen clashes with her father over her desire to tame a wild mustang in this sentimental update of Mary O'Hara's classic novel "My Friend Flicka."(n)

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy
programme.desc: In 1997, four of America's leading African-American stand-up comedians -- Steve Harvey, D.L. Hughley, Bernie Mac, and Cedric The Entertainer -- joined forces for a concert tour that became one of the top money-earning attractions of recent years, consistently selling out 10,000 to 15,000 seat arenas from coast to coast. The Original Kings of Comedy captures the tour's rough and raunchy humor on film. The concert documentary was shot in February of 2000 during a two-night stand in Charlotte, North Carolina (which was the site of the tour's first date three years earlier). Spike Lee served as director(n)

programme.title: A View to a Kill
programme.desc: MI6 agent James Bond's latest mission is to foil the evil plan of technology mogul Max Zorin, who wants to cause an earthquake that will wipe out his competitors in Silicon Valley(n)

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: This homage to Hitchcock opens with a man waking from a terrible accident. With his memory gone and his body shattered, he has to rely on his wife to help him reconstruct the past. But as the pieces come together, he realises that things might not have been as rosy before the accident as his wife had suggested. Doubtful of his own identity, he searches for someone who can help him find the truth(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks offers his irreverent and rollicking take on Star Wars and other sci-fi epics in this goofy comedy. The story features such characters as the princess Vespa, her nemesis Dark Helmet, and her hero Lone Starr(n)

programme.title: You Only Live Twice
programme.desc: In the fifth James Bond film, 007 is sent to investigate the disappearance of an American spacecraft and runs into Blofeld, a megalomaniac bent on starting World War III. Operating from a spectacular base built into a volcano, his radar-proof spacecraft has swallowed up American and Russian spaceships with the intention of causing the superpowers to blame each other and declare war(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand. Following Reggie and Missy's advice, Cam pays a visit to a dying, basketball-loving teen who hits him with a surprise request; Reggie suggests that Cam to put the family on the payroll(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Decisions. Missy works to score Reggie a membership in an exclusive country club that was founded by blacks, while Cam, in his search to support a church, gets a surprise from a pastor(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realises that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: The Accused
programme.desc: This movie is based on actual events. Sarah Tobias goes into a bar one night and winds up being gang raped by 3 guys. She is introduced to an attorney named Katherine Murphy. Not only does Katherine Murphy want to go after the men who committed the rape, she wants to go after the men in the bar who cheered it on. But Katherine has her work cut out for her. Her client has a past, and that past could be used against her in court(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Stripes is a wild, good-natured comedy about a pair of hard-luck friends (Bill Murray and Harold Ramis) who decide to join the Army, believing that it will help them sort out their lives. Though the plot is fairly predictable, Murray and Ramis are excellent, as are John Candy as another loser recruit and Warren Oates as an ill-tempered sergeant(n)

programme.title: Remo Williams: The Adventure Begins
programme.desc: A New York City cop is recruited by a super-secret quasi-governmental agency which is out to avenge society's wrongs. The cop is trained for the job by a Korean Sinanju master, then cut loose on the bad guys of the world. Based on the "Destroyer" books by Richard Sapir and Warren Murphy(n)

programme.title: American Ninja 3: Blood Hunt
programme.desc: This, the third issue in the American Ninja series, stars karate expert David Bradley who goes to Japan for ninja training so he'll be able to avenge his father's murder. Once trained, he enters in an international karate contest held by some no-goods who'd like to get their hands on the world's toughest fella so they can try out a new artificial disease they've created. (They figure the best way to test the disease is upon the toughest guy they can find.) Most action occurs on a Caribbean island(n)

programme.title: The Anomaly
programme.desc: Noel Clarke stars as an ex-soldier who must fight to discover why he is only conscious for bursts of nine minutes and 47 seconds(n)

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: A scientist on the verge of a major discovery in synthetic skin is burned beyond recognition when his laboratory is demolished by an evil gang. Altered by an experimental medical procedure, the man known as Darkman assumes 'identities' to reap revenge on his assailants(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Stripes is a wild, good-natured comedy about a pair of hard-luck friends (Bill Murray and Harold Ramis) who decide to join the Army, believing that it will help them sort out their lives. Though the plot is fairly predictable, Murray and Ramis are excellent, as are John Candy as another loser recruit and Warren Oates as an ill-tempered sergeant(n)

programme.title: Malone
programme.desc: When a retired CIA agent breaks down while driving through an Oregon village, he is soon drawn into the residents' ongoing battle against a nefarious local millionaire(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: A retired Special Forces colonel storms the South American stronghold of terrorists who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into deposing a Latin dictator(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie Croker, fresh out of prison, takes on a job to steal gold from Italy. In order to finance the raid he enlists the help of Mr Bridger, an established criminal. The team plans to distract the Italian police with a traffic jam whilst they make off with the bullion in three Mini Coopers..(n)

programme.title: The Anomaly
programme.desc: Noel Clarke stars as an ex-soldier who must fight to discover why he is only conscious for bursts of nine minutes and 47 seconds(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: Sophisticated special effects abound in this sci-fi thriller about a spacecraft that fell off the map---only to reappear seven years later. A rescue team headed by Captain Miller (Laurence Fishburne) is dispatched to search for survivors, but finds only abandoned corridors... until horrifying visions lead them to the truth behind what happened to the ship's crew. Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: A retired Special Forces colonel storms the South American stronghold of terrorists who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into deposing a Latin dictator(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Stripes is a wild, good-natured comedy about a pair of hard-luck friends (Bill Murray and Harold Ramis) who decide to join the Army, believing that it will help them sort out their lives. Though the plot is fairly predictable, Murray and Ramis are excellent, as are John Candy as another loser recruit and Warren Oates as an ill-tempered sergeant(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade in this wild horror comedy. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: Kill Bill director Quentin Tarantino and Sin City director Robert Rodriguez join forces to offer a cinematic tribute to the blood-soaked exploitation epics of yesteryear with this hyper-violent coupling of two full-length features punctuated by a collection of outrageous trailers. The first segment, directed by Rodriguez and entitled Planet Terror, details the violent struggle between a ravenous army of zombie-like humanoids who have taken control of the planet and the remaining survivors who refuse to go down without a fight. Freddy Rodriguez, Naveen Andrews, and Rose McGowan headline a cast that also includes Marley Shelton, Michael Biehn, Josh Brolin, Bruce Willis, and Tom Savini. In Death Proof -- director Tarantino's take on such peddle-to-the-metal shockers as White Line Fever -- Kurt Russell stars as an engine-revving psychopath who prefers to take out his beautiful victims at 200 mph. With a list of potential roadkill candidates that includes Rose McGowan, Jordan Ladd, Rosario Dawson, and Vanessa Ferlito, Death Proof takes viewers on an adrenaline-infused drive that's as sexy as it is shocking. Its tantalizing title borrowed from the term frequently used to describe the seedy, 1970s-era inner-city movie theaters that screened excessive, low-budget independent films containing copious amounts of violence and nudity as a means of offering counter-programming to the decidedly more restrained big-budget studio films, Grindhouse takes its love for these unabashedly sleazy efforts one step further by offering a jaw-dropping collection of fake exploitation trailers from such directors as Rob Zombie, Eli Roth, and Edgar Wright(n)

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: Peter Benchley's thriller pits a reporter against present-day pirates. Michael Caine, David Warner. Beth: Angela Punch McGregor. Windsor: Frank Middlemass. Rollo: Don Henderson. Brazil: Dudley Sutton. Hizzoner: Colin Jeavons. Wescott: Zakes Mokae. Directed by Michael Ritchie(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's terrifying masterpiece about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant Great White, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's best-seller, three sequels and numerous imitators followed(n)

programme.desc: Three teens are lured to a small town, where they are kidnapped by a maniacal fundamentalist preacher(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: Kill Bill director Quentin Tarantino and Sin City director Robert Rodriguez join forces to offer a cinematic tribute to the blood-soaked exploitation epics of yesteryear with this hyper-violent coupling of two full-length features punctuated by a collection of outrageous trailers. The first segment, directed by Rodriguez and entitled Planet Terror, details the violent struggle between a ravenous army of zombie-like humanoids who have taken control of the planet and the remaining survivors who refuse to go down without a fight. Freddy Rodriguez, Naveen Andrews, and Rose McGowan headline a cast that also includes Marley Shelton, Michael Biehn, Josh Brolin, Bruce Willis, and Tom Savini. In Death Proof -- director Tarantino's take on such peddle-to-the-metal shockers as White Line Fever -- Kurt Russell stars as an engine-revving psychopath who prefers to take out his beautiful victims at 200 mph. With a list of potential roadkill candidates that includes Rose McGowan, Jordan Ladd, Rosario Dawson, and Vanessa Ferlito, Death Proof takes viewers on an adrenaline-infused drive that's as sexy as it is shocking. Its tantalizing title borrowed from the term frequently used to describe the seedy, 1970s-era inner-city movie theaters that screened excessive, low-budget independent films containing copious amounts of violence and nudity as a means of offering counter-programming to the decidedly more restrained big-budget studio films, Grindhouse takes its love for these unabashedly sleazy efforts one step further by offering a jaw-dropping collection of fake exploitation trailers from such directors as Rob Zombie, Eli Roth, and Edgar Wright(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Captain's Marriage.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer is forced to attend anger-management classes for punching a police officer who claimed to be having an affair with his wife Karen. Unfortunately, he does not suspect his outburst of temper helped taint a crime scene and conceal a murder. Guest starring Glenne Headley (ER), Nicky Katt (Boston Public) and Misha Collins (Supernatural).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team investigate the mysterious death of a woman who received relationship advice from a radio-show host, and Rigsby and Van Pelt go undercover as a troubled couple in the hope of finding a lead. Crime drama, starring Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: When JJ LaRoche's house is robbed, he personally requests Jane's help with the case. The former head of CBI internal affairs tells Jane that one of the thieves got away with the secret plastic container he's kept hidden for nine years and begs him to solve the case before the contents are revealed and his life is destroyed. LaRoche suspects that the person responsible for high-level security leaks inside the agency is also behind the theft of the box. Guest starring Pruitt Taylor Vince, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Provenza and Flynn pose as hitmen to bring an attempted murder sting operation to a close, only to find all their evidence has been stolen while they stopped for lunch. Brenda is forced to free her suspect, and a furious Pope demands that Priory Homicide recover the missing items within 48 hours.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda struggles to decide how to handle the case of a missing boy - and as the investigation continues, suspicions arise as to whether he is a victim or a potential killer. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The death of Special Agent Ned Dorneget hits the team hard, and when Gibbs receives a visit from his late colleague's mother - CIA Officer Joanna Teague - he must decide whether to let her help with the investigation into the Calling. Meanwhile, Gibbs hopes his young charge Luke, formerly one of the Calling's radicalised footsoldiers, might be key to bringing the organisation down. However, when the terrorists discover where their defecting comrade has taken refuge, the abduct him and flee to Iraq. The team follows hot on their heels, but it seems Luke's ties to the Calling might be stronger than anyone at NCIS ever anticipated. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with guest Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Red John strikes again just as Jane narrows down the list of people who could be the serial killer to seven suspects, and the subsequent investigation uncovers a link between the victim and the CBI consultant. Guest starring Laura San Giacomo (Saving Grace, Pretty Woman), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Candidate - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Private investigator Adrian Monk, whose obsessive-compulsive disorder enables him to focus on minor details and solve even the most baffling of cases, agrees to help the police catch would-be assassin of mayoral candidate Warren St Claire. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub, Bitty Schram and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When Detective Sanchez's brother is murdered in a drive-by shooting, Brenda and the team try to discover who is responsible - while preventing their colleague from exacting personal revenge. However, the investigation is compromised when residents of the area where the crime was committed refuse to co-operate.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a hairdresser and discovers a history of domestic violence. Meanwhile, Brenda's parents visit, but annoy her by spending much of the trip asking about her marriage plans. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs throws himself back into his work following his near-death experience, updating his appearance and tackling a new risky case alongside DEA agent Luis Mitchell, who wants help bringing down a drugs cartel. Concerned about his colleague's apparent enthusiasm to re-enter the field, DiNozzo discovers Mitchell is the son of a former NCIS agent who gave his life trying to save Gibbs' late wife and daughter, and this attachment is causing Gibbs to break his own rule against personal involvement in a case. However, a significant danger is posed by Benson Long, the cartel's head, and Mitchell's top target.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine is found murdered in Quantico, mere hours after calling Gibbs to discuss a possible case. In response, Bishop and McGee go undercover as a married couple to run surveillance on a lieutenant and his wife, who may be connected to the death. Starring Mark Harmon, Emily Wickersham and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is kidnapped, but manages to escape her captor, and the team discovers her abduction may be connected to her missing husband. Meanwhile, Abby knits everyone `gifts'.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois and the rest of the Griffin family head to Florida in search of a retirement community for her father, whose behaviour has begun to cause concern - but he refuses to give up work and be bundled off to a home without a fight.(n)

programme.title: American Dad

programme.title: Poh & Co

programme.desc: Poh and Jono convert an old claw bath into a mushroom garden. Then, once she perfects mushroom risotto, Poh drives to the Barossa Valley to learn tea-blending techniques.(n)

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh and her team have expanded their market stall, where the real winner with customers is Poh's paella.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates the versatility of pastry as he prepares a variety of sweet and savoury recipes using pastry along with home-grown fruit and vegetables from his Essex garden. The chef shows how to create an Italian ham, nettle and spinach tart, a pie made with steak, Guinness and cheese, plus a traditional apple and blackberry pie.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver turns his attention to dishes using eggs collected from his hand-reared free-range hens. He creates a home-made tagliatelle, an omelette salad with bresaola, and a meringue with hot pears and chocolate sauce. He also starts some former battery hens off on their journey to a free-range life.(n)

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It's the last chance for the finalists to get a dish in contention for the final banquet and those who have failed to finish in the top three so far are going all out. Oliver Peyton, Prue Leith and Matthew Fort are joined by Winston Churchill's granddaughter Celia Sandys to pick the best three puddings, before the judges select the perfect menu from all four courses' shortlists.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree puts a breakfast spin on four dinners, starting with sausage kale strata. Wild rice pancakes get flipped to dinnertime for the girls, while the boys enjoy breakfast quesadillas.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: While Ree Drummond's daughter Alex and her friends have a dorm room craft day at college, Ree makes green chili chicken, spicy taco potatoes, layered Mexican salad and key lime pie.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Cake Wars
programme.desc: To celebrate the 100th birthday of world-famous children's author Roald Dahl, four bakers compete to have their cake at the centre of the party.(n)

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: Spin-off from the cookery competition featuring young contestants.(n)

programme.title: Man Finds Food
programme.desc: Adam explores Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, where he samples cashew smoked ribs and grilled pork wrapped in lemongrass at a hidden garden restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Man Finds Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman explores Hong Kong, where he visits a secret speakeasy hidden inside a stamp shop and tucks into a giant tomahawk steak at a pub that is off the beaten track.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates the versatility of rhubarb, a plant that has been neglected in the UK even though the country produces some of the best crops in the world. The chef uses it as a foundation for a hot and sour dish with crispy pork and noodles, a ginger souffle and a creamy cocktail drink.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef reveals three simple ways to cook and dress asparagus, and demonstrates how best to use the vegetable in a meal. Gardener Brian also explains that once established, asparagus practically takes care of itself and can last for up to 20 years.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking's eats at some of the country's best suppliers of cured, smoked and aged pork.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking heads to North and South Carolina to visit a couple of old school restaurants that have upheld a long tradition of mouthwatering barbecue for several generations.(n)

programme.title: Ginormous Food
programme.desc: Josh Denny rides into Louisville to try his luck with a trifecta of magnificent meals.(n)

programme.title: Ginormous Food
programme.desc: Josh Denny rolls into Cincinnati, where he samples two and a half pounds of Cincinnati-style chili on top of two and a half pounds of spaghetti.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Willie steps in to help Rich and Jeanie, owners of 12 Grapes Wine Bar. Rich has invested everything into the business, but it is jeopardising the couple's financial future.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The owners of Hot Red Bus near Los Angeles contact Charles after hearing that their restaurant is open on the one day it should be closed. Mystery Diner Kendall goes undercover.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Nico, owner of Capo's Speakeasy in Las Vegas, contacts Charles to help him again, so Rob and Kiel go undercover to see if Nico's private chef is cooking up trouble.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Wondering if Pearl still loves him, Howard asks Hobbo to give her a peck on the cheek from him - only to become even more despondent when he sees his wife deliver a passionate kiss. Meanwhile, Glenda sends Barry off to paint a landscape, hoping the activity will distract him from his hunger - but fish and chips is the only thing on his mind. Comedy, starring Russ Abbot, Robert Fyfe and Juliette Kaplan.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: How Not to Cry at Weddings.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Lair of the Cat Creature.

programme.title: Boomers
programme.desc: Comedy following the ups and downs of three newly retired couples living in the Norfolk resort of Thurnemouth. Joyce has organised a special lunch at a trendy gastropub to celebrate Carol and Trevor's 40th wedding anniversary, but her finely tuned plans are somewhat ruined by the arrival of Maureen and her lightweight mother Joan. Carol also looks set to put a dampener on the happy occasion with a rather unfortunate announcement, unless Joyce and Maureen can convince her to change her mind before she lives to regret it. Paula Wilcox, Alison Steadman, Stephanie Beacham, June Whitfield and James Smith star.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Food
programme.desc: Chef Keith Floyd visits Enzo Mauro at his restaurant in Newbridge, Penzance, where he also talks to Nick Howells about salted pilchards. programme.title: Floyd on Food
programme.desc: Keith Floyd cooks boeuf en daube and pollacks in green pepper sauce at the home of Trish Norris in Newquay.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Korean Food Tour
programme.desc: The chef discovers more Korean culinary wonders. He visits historic Join, eats Royal Bibimbap and enjoys ?The taste of Korea in a bun'.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The first three cooks face a Skills Test set by Monica Galetti who gives them 15 minutes to fillet a sea bream and cook it. Then Marcus Wareing sets the challenge for the next three contestants who have 20 minutes to make a watercress soup and serve it with poached eggs and fresh almonds. All six chefs then have one last chance to win over the judges in the second Signature Dish challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers look across the Channel to see how the French have influenced British food over the centuries. They prepare a roast chicken with 40 cloves of garlic, and a delicate mille feuille, and examine UK products in traditionally French areas of gastronomy, from award-winning English wines to Scottish garlic.(n)

programme.title: Heston's Fantastical Food
programme.desc: Heston Blumenthal celebrates the tea break on a monumental scale, bringing the Lancashire town of Darwen together for a unique brew. He takes on the challenge of creating the world's biggest packet of biscuits - one metre in diameter and combining several of the nation's favourite varieties - and creates a huge pyramid-shaped tea bag, as well as a giant teapot to serve the crowds.(n)

programme.title: Tom Kerridge's Proper Pub Food
programme.desc: The Michelin-starred chef demonstrates how to make two roast dinners that provide an alternative to the average British Sunday lunch. He begins by marinating beef in treacle for 24 hours before serving it with crispy roast potatoes and Yorkshire puddings, before moving on to a recipe of turbot wrapped in puff pastry, providing a meat-free take on beef Wellington. He finishes by creating a chocolate cake with muscovado cream, along with a light lemon posset.(n)

programme.title: Tom Kerridge's Proper Pub Food
programme.desc: The Michelin-starred chef makes family dishes inspired by British pub fare, preparing smoked haddock and parmesan omelette and giving the traditional roast chicken a farmyard twist by baking it in hay. He also demonstrates his take on the classic baked beans on toast and creates an apple toffee crumble pie for dessert.(n)

programme.title: King of the Road
programme.desc: Torture in Paradise. The teams are whisked away to a top secret destination for their last two days. Enjoi gets seasick, Deathwish goes cliff diving, and Gravette faces his greatest fear(n)

programme.title: New Best Friend
programme.desc: Three rich, pretty people befriend their poor, mousy classmate and live to regret it in this teen-centric thriller. Alicia (Mia Kirshner), Hadley (Meredith Monroe), Julianne (Rachel True), and Sydney (Dominique Swain) are four students enrolled in the same sociology class at Colby University, an exclusive and respected college in the Carolinas. Alicia is a local girl born into modest circumstances who struggles to make ends meet and rarely gets a second look from the male students on campus, while Hadley, Julianne, and Sydney are close friends who all come from wealthy families and seem more concerned with partying than their studies. Alicia and Hadley are paired up to work on their semester project for the class, which is to be centered around the theme "Lead, Follow, or Get Out of the Way." As part of the project, Hadley decides to befriend Alicia, and brings her into her social circle. At first, Alicia seems more than grateful for the attention of her new friends, and blooms under the influence of Hadley, Julianne, and Sydney. But it isn't long before Alicia's personality begins to shift; she develops a powerful appetite for drugs and alcohol, and soon begins taking advantage of her new friendships. Things come to a head when Alicia seduces Sydney's boyfriend, Josh (Oliver Hudson), and soon Alicia ends up in the hospital after OD'ing on drugs. Artie Bonner (Taye Diggs), a local sheriff, begins looking into Alicia's case, convinced that her near-fatal accident with drugs was no accident at all(n)

Chris Murphy (D-Conn.)(n)

programme.title: The Rocker

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner (Edward Norton) have been living in shadows, seeking a cure to his unique condition, which causes him to turn into The Incredible Hulk, a giant green monster, under emotional stress. But the military forces who dream of abusing his powers won't leave him alone. Upon returning to civilization, Banner is ruthlessly pursued by a nightmarish beast whose powers match The Hulk's own. A fight of comic-book proportions ensues as Banner must call upon the hero within to rescue New York City from total destruction(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: A highway shunt between lawyer Gavin Banek and divorcee Doyle Gipson turns nasty. Banek, late for court, flees the scene. Gipson arrives late too - and finds out he's lost access to his kids. To his mind, it's Banek's fault and he's going to pay. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Director Michael Bay returns with his second instalment of the sci-fi action romp that pits humans against some big, bad (very bad) alien robots, the Decepticons. In this sequel, which manages to be even louder and more prone to explosions than the initial outing, Sam Witwicky and his girlfriend Mikaela Banes are once more at the centre of the action. Witwicky is being hunted down by the Decepticons, who recognise that he is their main impediment to their gaining control of an awesome source of energy. As the Decepticons' plan would result in the destruction of the Sun, mankind's fate rests on the shoulders (and in the ingenuity) of our oddly named hero... Edited for language and violence(n)

programme.desc: Sports-doping spoof focusing on a fictional, world-class cycling event in 1982 that was marred by one controversy after another, as recalled by five riders, commentators, celebrities and other assorted ne'er-do-wells(n)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: A suburban couple returning to their semi-secluded house after attending a wedding finds their lives suddenly thrown into chaos with the arrival of three malevolent, masked strangers in director Bryan Bertino's tense tale of survival. Liv Tyler and Scott Speedman star as the couple forced to resort to violence they never thought themselves capable of as they struggle for their lives, and model-turned-actress Gemma Ward continues her transition from the catwalk to the silver screen as one of the merciless masked invaders(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Jason Bourne emerges from seclusion to reenter the world of high-stakes espionage(n)

programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Selena was a 23-year old Tejana singer on the verge of an international breakthrough when she was shot by the president of her own fan club. Her death spawned an outpouring of grief not seen since the death of Elvis Presley. This upbeat and tuneful biopic, executive produced by her father, Abraham Quintanilla (portrayed in the film by Edward James Olmos), is a celebration of his daughter's life, chronicling her rise to fame. The film opens with Selena (Jennifer Lopez) performing at the Houston Astrodome before a sold-out audience. The story moves backwards and begins not with Selena, but with Abraham who in the early '60s had an unsuccessful doo-wop group in Texas. As a child, Selena (Rebecca Lee Meza) showed an exceptional talent for singing. Abraham exploited that and the talents of his other two children to form a band. Much of the film focuses on the fact that Selena, though born in Texas in a Mexican-American community, had to learn Spanish as a second language. Her father insisted that she sing in the language, but it was not easy for her. To maintain the story's celebratory air, it only lightly touches on Selena's relationship with her killer -- the actual shooting occurs off-screen. The after-effects of Selena's death are also only briefly presented(n)

programme.title: Biker Boyz
programme.desc: Motorcycle enthusiasts should go hog-wild for this revved-up action flick. Laurence Fishburne is Smoke, president and ace rider of a biker club that engages in illegal street competitions. A young up-and-comer (Derek Luke) with a secret up his sleeve challenges Smoke to become king of the road and the race is on. Orlando Jones, Lisa Bonet, Vanessa Bell Calloway, Kid Rock(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this portrait of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger, which depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented and heroic feat, the traumatized pilot must endure second-guessing by investigators, the weight of sudden fame, and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day. Anna Gunn, Laura Linney, and Aaron Eckhart co-star. Directed by Clint Eastwood(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt has been sent on a mission to retrieve and destroy the supply of a genetically created disease called 'Chimera'. His mission is made impossible due to the fact that he is not the only person after samples of the disease. He must also contest with a gang of international terrorists headed by a turned bad former IMF agent who has already managed to steal the cure called 'Bellerophon' and now need 'Chimera' to complete their grand plan of infecting the whole world(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter joins forces with a witch to stop a plague that could decimate the population of New York City(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: The plot revolves around Will Hunting, who is a janitor at M.I.T. and has a unique gift for mathematics. But irresponsibility and carefree attitude becomes a hindrance towards his progress for which he requires help from a psychologist to find direction in his life(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Fact-based tarring Julia Roberts and Albert Finney about an unsophisticated single mother who stumbles upon an environmental cover-up which eventually leads to a class action lawsuit. While working for a lawyer, she is puzzled by an old case and decides to do some research of her own. She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Alex Jones. Alex Jones and InfoWars; Donald Trump's transgender military ban; Anthony Scaramucci; and the Senate's failure to pass the Health Care Freedom Act are discussed(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Bull Rush. Spencer goes to Las Vegas on business and gets reacquainted with an old flame who's working for Wayne(n)

programme.title: Room 104

programme.title: Emelie
