programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Death is back and he wants more victims in this follow-up to the teen horror hit Final Destination . Clear Rivers (Ali Larter), the only survivor of the original cull, is recruited by Kimberley Corman (A J Cook) to stop Death's second campaign. Corman foresaw a highway pileup but those she saved are now marked. Can the pair, with the help of Officer Burke (Michael Landes) and the knowledge of the sage William Bludworth (Tony Todd), save those marked for death? Directed by David R Ellis(n)

programme.title: Black Dynamite
programme.desc: The city streets explode into violence when "The Man" kills Black Dynamite's (Michael Jai White) brother in this seamless recreation of the blaxploitation classics of the 1970s. He was the best agent that the CIA ever had, but these days Black Dynamite only answers to one boss -- himself. When "The Man" ices Black Dynamite's brother, starts pumping heroin into the local orphanage, and floods the ghetto with a secret weapon disguised as common malt liquor, the car chases, gunfights, and shirtless brawls that follow prove wild enough to make even Dolemite green with envy(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Biopic following George W Bush's unlikely journey from reckless beer-swilling frat boy to President of the United States(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A married couple who are eager to have a baby hire a seemingly stable young woman to be their surrogate. However, the latter soon becomes infatuated with the husband, and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Adam Sandler is a Mossad agent who fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: As a huge comet blasts towards Earth, America sends up a team of ace astronauts to blast a hole in it before it obliterates humanity(n)

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Biopic following George W Bush's unlikely journey from reckless beer-swilling frat boy to President of the United States(n)

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: American Revolution drama starring Mel Gibson and Heath Ledger in which a widowed farmer forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort. He has a brave but brutal military past, yet decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child(n)

Thriller, based on a true story. A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor (Kevin Spacey) to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security (Laurence Fishburne) makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam. Chan is Chief Inspector Lee of the Royal Hong Kong Police, who travels back to China with his American colleague, Los Angeles detective James Carter. The men intend to take some vacation time but are quickly pulled into the case of two murdered U.S. customs agents. Lee and Carter are soon embroiled in a dangerous mystery(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Tom Cruise guns the engine in this action drama about a stock-car racer(n)

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: Mitch McDeere is a young man with a promising future in Law. About to sit his Bar exam, he is approached by 'The Firm' and made an offer he doesn't refuse. Seduced by the money and gifts showered on him, he is totally oblivious to the more sinister side of his company. Then, two Associates are murdered. The FBI contact him, asking him for information and suddenly his life is ruined. He has a choice - work with the FBI, or stay with the Firm. Either way he will lose his life as he knows it. Mitch figures the only way out is to follow his own plan..(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: After awakening from hyper-sleep with no memory of their mission, astronauts Lt. Payton and Cpl. Bower discover that the 60,000 passengers aboard their vast spacecraft have vanished without a trace(n)

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: A heavyweight cast (smooth, serene Sean Connery, bumbling Wesley Snipes, hardman Harvey Keitel) play the cops who must get to the truth when the murder of a good-time girl is recorded on a videotape. Tense, stylish and a big hit in its day(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: In spite of these responsibilities, the young man attempts to lead a normal existence, until he meets a woman passing through town and life becomes even more complicated. Based on the novel by Peter Hedges(n)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Family sports comedy about a successful football player who has to sacrifice his career to look after the seven-year-old daughter he never knew he had. The fun-loving bachelor, whose gridiron career is about to take off, is shocked to learn he has a young daughter from a forgotten fling. Against the wishes of his ambitious agent, he immerses himself in fatherhood - exchanging training sessions for junior ballet classes, and touchdowns for dolls. Starring Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, Madison Pettis, Kyra Sedgwick, Roselyn Sanchez, Morris Chestnut, Hayes MacArthur(n)

programme.title: Bunyan & Babe
programme.desc: After traveling through a portal near his grandparents' farm, a young boy named Travis (voice of Johnny Orlando) is shocked to meet American folk hero Paul Bunyan (John Goodman) and his pet ox Babe (Jeff Foxworthy). Soon, Bunyan and Babe decide to explore the real world, where they help Travis and his family fight back against a greedy real-estate developer (Kelsey Grammer)(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way(n)

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: Jewish David Green is brought into a prestigious school in the 1950s to help beat the football team. However, David keeps his ethnicity secret through fear of being rejected. Stars Matt Damon.(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: Roman soldier Clavius and his partner Lucius are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during their investigation(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Adventurer Nicolas Cage is plunged into an adrenaline-fuelled quest to prove his ancestor was not an assassin. Spectacular popcorn fun with Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: The story of the only Irishman ever deported from Ireland, Jimmy Gralton, who was arrested and ousted during the country's Red Scare of the 1930s(n)

programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: Andy Tennant's romantic comedy fantasy is set in 16th-century France, where, following the death of her father, Danielle De Barbarac is assigned kitchen duties in the castle by her stepmother Baroness Rodmilla de Ghent. A chance meeting with Prince Henry, heir apparent to the throne, leads to the potential for a romance that she fears could be ruined if he discovers a masquerade. A 'fairy-godmother' in the shape of Leonardo da Vinci eventually smoothes the path of true love but thanks to Barrymore, this is not another soft retelling of Cinderella but a punchy, energetic film with Barrymore in excellent form as the forthright Danielle(n)

programme.title: Honey 2
programme.desc: A 17-year-old girl competes in a national dance tournament after returning to the Bronx, where she attracts the attention of an aspiring dance troupe(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Adventurer Nicolas Cage is plunged into an adrenaline-fuelled quest to prove his ancestor was not an assassin. Spectacular popcorn fun with Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: Roman soldier Clavius and his partner Lucius are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during their investigation(n)

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: A 15-year-old farm boy steals a cache of drug money in order to run away with his abused next-door neighbor. However, the two of them are pursued by her father, a corrupt cop, in this taut thriller(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: In this darkly comic drama, Edward Norton stars as a depressed young man (named in the credits only as "Narrator") who has become a small cog in the world of big business. He doesn't like his work and gets no sense of reward from it, attempting instead to drown his sorrows by putting together the "perfect" apartment. He can't sleep and feels alienated from the world at large; he's become so desperate to relate to others that he's taken to visiting support groups for patients with terminal diseases so that he'll have people to talk to. One day on a business flight, he discovers Tyler Durden (Brad Pitt), a charming iconoclast who sells soap. Tyler doesn't put much stock in the materialistic world, and he believes that one can learn a great deal through pain, misfortune, and chaos. Tyler cheerfully challenges his new friend to a fight. Our Narrator finds that bare-knuckle brawling makes him feel more alive than he has in years, and soon the two become friends and roommates, meeting informally to fight once a week. As more men join in, the "fight club" becomes an underground sensation, even though it's a closely guarded secret among the participants. (First rule: Don't talk about fight club. Second rule: Don't talk about fight club.) But as our Narrator and Tyler bond through violence, a strange situation becomes more complicated when Tyler becomes involved with Marla (Helena Bonham Carter), whom our Narrator became infatuated with when they were both crashing the support-group circuit. Based on the novel by Chuck Palahniuk, Fight Club was directed by David Fincher, who previously directed Pitt in the thriller Seven(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: US Marine Anthony Swofford may be a top sniper, but will he ever get to take the shot he's been trained for? Boredom and bullets in Sam Mendes' gritty Gulf War drama(n)

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: A 15-year-old farm boy steals a cache of drug money in order to run away with his abused next-door neighbor. However, the two of them are pursued by her father, a corrupt cop, in this taut thriller(n)

programme.title: Elle
programme.desc: A woman decides to hunt down the man who sexually assaulted her in her own home instead of going to the police. When she finally tracks down her assailant, they become locked in a dangerous game that threatens to consume them both(n)

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: In this historical drama, idealistic German public prosecutor Johann Radmann (Alexander Fehling) becomes interested in the case of Charles Schulz, a former Nazi officer at Auschwitz who is now a schoolteacher. Radmann initially encounters resistance from the rest of his department when he begins his investigation, but senior prosecutor Walter Friedberg (Robert Hunger-Buhler) ultimately allows him to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp. Helmed by first-time feature-film director Giulio Ricciarelli, Labyrinth of Lies is based on the Frankfurt Auschwitz trials, a previously lesser-known chapter of Germany's post-WWII history in which the country was forced to reckon with the Nazis who returned to everyday life following the end of the war. Germany's official Foreign Language submission for the 2016 Academy Awards. Friederike Becht, Andre Szymanski, and Hansi Jochmann co-star(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Campy horror flick about a scientist (Dina Meyer) and a local sheriff (Lou Diamond Phillips) trying to stop deadly and unexplained bat attacks in a small Texas town. Bob Gunton, Leon. Directed by Louis Morneau(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: A family holiday gets competitive when dad of 12 Tom Baker discovers that his childhood rival has hit the big time and erected a huge holiday home on the same lake(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: A widower and father of three who also writes a parenting advice column for his local newspaper falls for the girlfriend of his younger brother during a family vacation in director Peter Hedges' offbeat love-triangle laugher. Steve Carell stars as the writer who finds his widely known convictions put to the ultimate test, with Dane Cook and Juliette Binoche respectively assuming the roles of the younger sibling and his radiant girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: US Marine Anthony Swofford may be a top sniper, but will he ever get to take the shot he's been trained for? Boredom and bullets in Sam Mendes' gritty Gulf War drama(n)

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and Val Kilmer team up for this terrifying tale about a pair of lions which terrorised the African plains in the late 1800s. John Patterson (Kilmer) is an engineer trying to construct a series of bridges in East Africa to support the forthcoming railway line. When construction on the project is halted by the rumours of two 'Devils of the Night' - a couple of staggeringly devious lions nicknamed ' The Ghost' and 'The Darkness' - Patterson knows that he must have the creatures killed. Joining forces with wild game hunter Remington (Douglas), Patterson attempts to outwit the lions - but they are far cleverer than either man could ever have imagined(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: Rambo meets Airplane! Commando Charlie Sheen infiltrates the Middle East with the help of Lloyd Bridges' barking mad president(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: Hilarious police thriller spoof, starring Leslie Nielsen as the staggeringly ine cop, Frank Drebin(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
programme.desc: Slapstick gags galore when Lt Frank Drebin, the world's clumsiest police detective, returns to investigate another case. When he discovers an evil plan to destroy America, Drebin sets out to derail it...with predictably hilarious results(n)

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Slapstick sequel with clueless cop Frank Drebin saving the Oscars from a mad bomber. A comedy with an unusual supporting cast that includes Academy Award winner George Kennedy, OJ Simpson and Anna Nicole Smith(n)

programme.title: Van Wilder: Freshman Year
programme.desc: Van Wilder starts his freshman year at Coolidge College and embarks on an adventure to land the campus hottie and liberate his school from sexual oppression and party dysfunction(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Equity
programme.desc: A senior investment banker tries to prove her worth to her firm by bringing in a tech company that's on the verge of going public. However, the IPO causes her to get tangled up in an investigation into securities fraud in this intense drama(n)

programme.title: American Me
programme.desc: An epic and compelling drama from actor/director Edward James Olmos. The film follows three generations of a Hispanic American family, from the 1943 Pachuco Los Angelean riots to the turmoil of the mid-1970s. Olmos himself plays Santana, a crime lord who rules over the LA underworld from within his cell in Folsom State Prison, Sacramento. The film charts the rise of the so-called Mexican Mafia in a brutal and disturbing fashion, but retains the message that gang warfare, for whatever reason, can never be justified(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Straight-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed(n)

programme.title: The Eagle Huntress
programme.desc: This inspiring documentary profiles a 13-year-old Mongolian girl who strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders(n)

programme.title: Wadjda
programme.desc: Rites-of-passage drama about a headstrong 10-year-old girl which explores the realities of everyday life for women in Saudi Arabia(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: David Lean directed this Oscar-winning epic about T.E. Lawrence, a British Army lieutenant who led the Arab revolt against the Turks during World War I(n)

programme.title: The Eagle Huntress
programme.desc: This inspiring documentary profiles a 13-year-old Mongolian girl who strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Oscar-nominee Joaquin Phoenix plays Johnny Cash, and Oscar-winner Reese Witherspoon plays June Carter in James Mangold's acclaimed biographical film about country music's legendary 'Man in Black'. The film follows Cash from his childhood, where he was touched by tragedy, through his years on the road to his marriage to June Carter, who was country royalty (having been a part of the massively influential Carter Family band), and their struggle to find happiness as she weans him off booze and drugs. Walk the Line is a warts-and-all biopic, showing Cash's faults as well as his undoubted star quality as one of the greatest singer/songwriters that America has ever produced(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: West of Memphis
programme.desc: The West Memphis Three fight to gain their freedom after being wrongfully convicted of murder when they were in their teens(n)

programme.title: Amour
programme.desc: An octogenarian couple find their love put to the ultimate test when the wife suffers a debilitating stroke and her husband becomes her caretaker(n)

programme.title: L'Auberge Espagnole
programme.desc: In this refreshing and lively comedy, a French student moves to Barcelona to study Spanish to improve his career opportunities. He moves in with six other European roommates and gets some lessons in life and love(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Oscar-nominee Joaquin Phoenix plays Johnny Cash, and Oscar-winner Reese Witherspoon plays June Carter in James Mangold's acclaimed biographical film about country music's legendary 'Man in Black'. Walk the Line is a warts-and-all biopic, showing Cash's faults as well as his undoubted star quality as one of the greatest singer/songwriters that America has ever produced(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama about a gay, HIV-positive lawyer's fight against unlawful dismissal by his homophobic employers and his search for someone to represent him in court(n)

programme.title: Amour
programme.desc: An octogenarian couple find their love put to the ultimate test when the wife suffers a debilitating stroke and her husband becomes her caretaker(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: After being dumped by his conniving girlfriend, nerdy Nick meets sassy Norah on a crazy night out in the Big Apple. As the two bond over their love of music, their respective exes try to spoil the moment. Comedy(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
programme.desc: Laconic barber Ed Crane sees the chance for a quick buck in blackmailing Big Dave, his wife's lover. Suspicion and betrayal in a smoky, atmospheric 40s crime thriller from the Coen Brothers(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Woman
programme.desc: An actress wrestles with feelings of guilt and remorse following an affair with Charles Dickens in this gorgeously detailed period drama. Upon the author's death, all evidence of their 13-year romance is effectively erased from the history books(n)

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: In a moment of youthful indiscretion, Sir Robert Chiltern provided an Austrian baron with secret Foreign Office information. As payment he received the money that became the basis of his fortune and of his splendid, otherwise unimpeachable government career. Years later, he is blackmailed by a mysterious woman who also happens to be an acquaintance of his wife(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: In this gripping historical drama, an adventurous young British woman (Alicia Vikander) wins a scholarship to Oxford, where she falls in love with a fellow student. Not much later, their relationship is tested when he joins the military following the onset of World War I(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A striving cartoonist is forced to return back to his family when his mother falls ill, while awaiting the birth of his first child(n)

programme.title: Happy Endings
programme.desc: An unexpected assignation between stepsiblings Mamie and Charley results in Mamie becoming pregnant, with the child being put up for adoption shortly after birth. Twenty years later, Mamie is approached by Nicky, an aspiring filmmaker with an abrasive personality who claims to know where her long-lost son is living. However, there's a catch -- Nicky wants to shoot the reunion for the student film he's working on, and won't tell her about her child unless she agrees(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Frenetic satire in which a down-on-his-luck film director decides that a leading man's refusal to star in his new project is no obstacle to getting it made - he will merely 'surprise' him with hidden cameras and get the actor's nerdy brother to fill in where necessary(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Molly Shannon brings her Saturday Night Live character Mary Katherine Gallagher to the silver screen. A mildly hyperactive Catholic school student convinced that she smells bad, Mary Catherine has a dream: she wants a boy to kiss her. Not just any old sloppy teenage make-out party kind of smooch, but the sort of kiss that will make her tingle with joy from head to toe. The trouble is, boys aren't all that interested in Mary Catherine, especially not Sky (Will Ferrell), the boy she'd most like to be kissed by. So Mary Catherine has a goal: if she wants to be kissed the way boys kiss girls in the movies, then she must become a movie star. Not a bad idea, but how does one bring this about? Superstar co-stars Elaine Hendrix and former Kids in the Hall cast member Mark McKinney, while another Kids in the Hall alumnus, Bruce McCulloch, directed(n)

programme.title: The Lady in the Van
programme.desc: In this heartfelt comedy-drama, a homeless woman parks her van in the driveway of playwright Alan Bennett's house, and lives there for 15 years. Over the course of her stay, the two form a unique friendship. Based on a true story that became a hit stage play in 1999(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: As American soldiers go to war in 1943, Tom Hanks is hired to coach a team of female baseball players, including Geena Davis and Madonna. Can they win over a sceptical public?(n)

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: A couple who are called away from home reluctantly choose their children's unreliable Uncle Buck to babysit for three weeks(n)

programme.title: Tamara Drewe
programme.desc: An ugly duckling-turned-beautiful swan named Tamara Drewe returns to her home town after her mother's death. While attempting to put her family's affairs in order, she's pursued by a trio of local men who remember her from before she was a knockout(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: Comedy for those who like their humour unsullied by subtlety. Marlon Wayans displays his physical comic ability as an economics graduate who takes part in a drug trial that leads to the development of supersenses. Using his powers to get ahead in business, he is successful for a while, but it is not long before the drug begins to backfire(n)

Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Dan Hedaya, Loni Anderson, Molly Shannon, Colin Quinn, Gigi Rice, Elisa Donovan, Meredith Scott Lynn, Jennifer Coolidge(n)

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A Boston publisher falls for a widowed carpenter she hired to do repair work. Star Faye Dunaway's foray into series TV was a disappointment; only four episodes aired(n)

programme.title: Sydney White
programme.desc: Modern American retelling of the fairytale Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Sydney White goes away to college and enrols in the same sorority house her mother used to be in, only to find that girls these days aren't as nice as her mother. Moving in with seven social outcasts in the run down frat house next door, she takes on the system and tries to show the college cool kids how selfish their hierarchy has become(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as detective Chandler Jarrell. He is told he is the 'Chosen One' who has to find and protect The Golden Child, a Buddhist mystic who was been kidnapped by an evil sorcerer(n)

programme.title: The Mexican

programme.title: Idiocracy

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Freddy Rodriguez, John Leguizamo, Debra Messing, Alfred Molina, and Elizabeth Peña star in Washington Heights director Alfredo de Villa's earnest family drama about the importance of familial relationships in times of personal crisis. The snow is falling and Christmas has come to Chicago. For the Rodriguez family, there is particular cause to celebrate this year; youngest sibling Jesse (Rodriguez) has recently returned home safe and sound after fighting in the war overseas. But as the members of the Rodriguez family converge on their parent's home, there's a strange sense of tension lingering heavy in the cool winter air. Despite the fact that Jesse is doing his best to get back in the good graces of his old flame, she seems reluctant to forgive him for leaving in the first place. Meanwhile, his older sister, Roxanna, has little to show for time spent chasing her Hollywood dreams, and eldest brother Mauricio (Leguizamo) is married to a high-strung executive who seems more interested in advancing her career than starting a family. But while none of this sits too well with concerned mother Anna (Peña), the bombshell she's about to drop could prove the straw that broke this family's back. When Anna announces to her children that she is planning to divorce their father, Eduardo (Molina), Roxanna, Jesse, and Mauricio instinctively pull together and begin to reevaluate their past while looking at the future in a whole new light. Later, as lingering resentments are let go and weakened bonds are reaffirmed, the Rodriquez family begins to experience the healing power of laughter while discovering that together as a family they are far stronger than they ever could be apart(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: Thriller about a killer stalking a group of FBI profilers who've gathered for a weekend of training(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Distinguished by a sharp, witty dialogue between its two cop protagonists, Ray and Danny (Gregory Hines and Billy Crystal), this entertaining crime drama is well worth a visit. Ray and Danny are nearly blown away by super bad guy Julio (Jimmy Smits), and their boss is peeved at them as usual. So the two are given a holiday from their beat in Chicago and travel to the sunny shores of Key West. They like it enough to retire from police work and open a business there. But when the duo returns to the Windy City, Julio is about to pull off a big drug deal and retirement may not be such a good idea(n)

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman stars as an American police chief in Puerto Rico who suspects that a millionaire attorney (Gene Hackman) may be responsible for the deaths of two young girls. But the ensuing interrogation reveals that both men may have something to hide. Thomas Jane, Monica Bellucci, Nydia Caro, Miguel Angel Suarez(n)

programme.title: Dysfunctional Friends
programme.desc: Years after graduating college and going their separate ways, nine former friends reunite at the funeral of a quirky, wealthy acquaintance, and learn that they are all eligible for a big inheritance if they can just spend five days together at his former estate. Meanwhile, as the clock starts ticking, what first seemed like a lighthearted reunion quickly turns sour as old wounds are reopened, and lingering grudges are resurrected. Now if anyone leaves, everyone sacrifices their portion of the estate. And as the hours stretch into days, the prospect of being trapped in a mansion with people who know their deepest, darkest secrets grows increasingly unbearable for all involved. Christian Keyes, Stacy Kiebler, Stacey Dash, and Terrell Owens star(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: When corrupt businessman Max catches thief Kevin robbing his house, he rubs a little salt in the wound, stealing the burglar's lucky ring as he's being arrested. Kevin is enraged and vows to have his revenge. But which one's the bigger crook?(n)

programme.title: Jay Pharoah: Can I Be Me?
programme.desc: Comedian and impressionist Jay Pharoah performs a stand-up routine from the Cutting Room in New York City(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: When an aspiring singer is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover, she meets a tabloid darling and headline singer who is in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail(n)

programme.title: The Watcher
programme.desc: A detective tracking a serial killer gives up all hope of solving the crimes and moves to another city. After he's settled in, the old acquaintance makes himself known. The serial killer has resurrected and begins sending him new pictures of new victims(n)

programme.desc: Writer-director David Mamet's riveting drama touches on the worlds of mixed martial arts, Hollywood and shady con men. Chiwetel Ejiofor gives a knock-out performance as a jujitsu instructor who gets conned into fighting in a money bout after getting backed into a financial corner. Mamet is a practitioner of jujitsu. programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A young man tries to tie up some loose ends before he goes to war in this independent drama from director Neil Abramson. Mike Holland (Nick Cannon) is nineteen years old and has just completed his basic training as a private in the United States Marine Corps. Mike has a four-day leave so he can visit his family for Thanksgiving, and then has orders for combat duty in Iraq. Mike wants to spend time with his family and friends before he ships out, but he doesn't want to tell anyone that he'll be stationed in Iraq. While taking the bus home to Bakersfield, California, Mike meets Cristina (Melonie Diaz), and it doesn't take long for him to realize he's infatuated with her. Mike makes a date to spend some time with Cristina, but he already has a busy schedule over the next four days. Mike catches up with his little sister (Erica Gluck), his doting mother (April Grace) and her taciturn new husband (Tom Sizemore), and sees his estranged father (Chi McBride) for the first time in years. Mike also hangs out with his best friend Jake (Matt O'Leary), but discovers he's begun taking a different path in life while Mike was in boot camp. And Mike happens to meet a disabled soldier back from Iraq (Jay Hernandez) who gives him an idea of what he can expect during his tour of duty. American Son was screened in competition at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: The sub-zero heroes from the worldwide blockbuster CGI film Ice Age are back. In the new film, the Ice Age is coming to an end, and the animals are delighting in the melting paradise that is their new world. Ray Romano, John Leguizamo and Denis Leary return to voice our three heroes: Manny, Sid, and Diego. New cast members include Academy AwardR nominee Queen Latifah (Chicago), Seann William Scott (the American Pie trilogy), late night talk show king Jay Leno, Will Arnett (Arrested Development) and Josh Peck (Drake and Josh). Ice Age: The Meltdown has everything you loved about the first movie with even more comedy, action, and spectacular visuals. Our three heroes' unyielding friendship lives on with some memorable new characters thrown into the mix. The result will thaw hearts of all ages. Starring Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Queen Latifah and Seann William Scott(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Tennis player Peter Colt (Paul Bettany) is about to retire, unable to fulfill his dream of becoming one of the world's top players. He holds position 119 in the world ranking, but, all the same, he is invited to play in Wimbledon. The traditional tournament, where he finds himself for the first time, seems the ideal place for a farewell, to start a new life the following day as a tennis coach, though the plan might not be very appealing. At the same championship is Lizzie Bradbury (Kirsten Dunst), heading for stardom and dating the American, Jake Hammond (Austin Nichols), another great figure in the circuit. But Peter and Lizzie happen to meet one day and their destiny starts to look different from what seemed unchangeable(n)

programme.title: If You Build It
programme.desc: Two ambitious designers create a one-of-a-kind learning opportunity at a small North Carolina school, allowing teens to conceptualize and construct a real building. They overcome criticism from those in the community who are opposed to doing anything radically different, as well as a lack of funding, in order to put their program in place(n)

programme.desc: A theme-park worker teams up with his robots to get a ring for his childhood crush(n)

programme.title: Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Heroes of Tomorrow: In a possible alternative world of the future, the Avengers have all been slain - except Tony Stark and Thor. Stark rescued the Avengers' children and brought them up. Now James, Torunn, Azari and Pym must face up to their parents' killer, and try to rid the world of evil robot Ultron. They find help from an unexpected quarter: the previously unknown son of Hawkeye, Barton. Can this fabulous five succeed where their parents failed? (2008) Stars: (voices) Aidan Drummond, Noah Crawford, Brenna O'Brien. Directors: Jay Oliva, Gary Hartle(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Tennis player Peter Colt (Paul Bettany) is about to retire, unable to fulfill his dream of becoming one of the world's top players. He holds position 119 in the world ranking, but, all the same, he is invited to play in Wimbledon. The traditional tournament, where he finds himself for the first time, seems the ideal place for a farewell, to start a new life the following day as a tennis coach, though the plan might not be very appealing. At the same championship is Lizzie Bradbury (Kirsten Dunst), heading for stardom and dating the American, Jake Hammond (Austin Nichols), another great figure in the circuit. But Peter and Lizzie happen to meet one day and their destiny starts to look different from what seemed unchangeable(n)

programme.title: Bye Bye, Love
programme.desc: Three divorced fathers struggle to bond with their children and to deal with their conflicting emotions about their ex-wives in this comedy drama. Dave and his ex get along pretty well, but since the divorce, he has become a bit of a rake and is loathe to commit to his new girl friend. Donny still pines for his ex, while Vic would like to see his former wife and her new lover die slow, painful deaths. The three men come together to discuss their new and past experiences. Although at first their stories are presented episodically, eventually their multi-layered lives converge on one chaotic night(n)

programme.title: Lake Placid 2
programme.desc: The serine waters of Lake Placid stir once again in this sequel that finds laid-back Sheriff James Riley (John Schneider) teaming with an inquisitive Fish and Wildlife Agent (Sarah LaFleur), a quick-triggered big game hunter (Sam McMurray), and his intuitive guide (Joe Holt) to investigate suspicions that another killer crock may be on the loose in the rural community. Two years ago, a pair of thirty foot-long prehistoric crocodiles terrorized the residents of Lake Placid. While most of the locals assumed that the nightmare had ended when the murderous creatures were killed, local crocodile lover Sadie (Cloris Leachman) knows that the truth is far more terrifying. Beneath the surface of Lake Placid, the remaining predators have been quietly reproducing, awaiting the moment they will emerge from the water and cement their status on the top of the food chain. Now, as Sheriff Riley's rebellious teenage son (Shad Collins) departs for a relaxing lakeside camping trip, the desperate father realizes the danger that lies beneath the surface and races to confront a prehistoric predator that won't stop until it's consumed every last local(n)

programme.title: Dinoshark
programme.desc: Step aside Sharktopus, there's a new mutant in the ocean and it's a prehistoric killing machine that's had thousands of years to build up an appetite. Freed from its glacial prison by a sudden climate shift, the Antarctic nightmare quickly makes its way down to Mexico, where the crowded beaches are a virtual buffet for a starving sea monster. As the scenic sands run red with blood and terrified beachcombers flee for their lives, fearless captain Trace (Eric Balfour) and headstrong Marin biologist Carol (Iva Hasperger) quickly realize that the culprit is a creature that could eat Jaws for breakfast. Now, in order to defeat the beast and make the beaches safe again, Trace and Carol will need the help of the world's one and only Dinoshark specialist (Roger Corman). But the closer the trio gets to the dreaded Dinoshark, the more they risk becoming its next meal(n)

programme.desc: (1999) Steve Miner's comedy-horror is set on the picturesque Black Lake in Maine (the film's title is a non-sequitur). When a beaver-tagger is munched up by a mystery beast, one of cinema's most disparate groups of heroes gathers to investigate. Fish warden Jack Wells (Bill Pullman), city-girl and palaeontologist Kelly Scott (Bridget Fonda) and redneck Sheriff Hank Keough (Brendan Gleeson) are joined by eccentric millionaire Hector Cyr (Oliver Platt), who has his own reasons for joining the hunt. But when they discover what's lurking in the lake's depths, they must all fight for their lives. Also starring Golden Girl Betty White as Mrs Bickerman, a deliciously foul-mouthed widow who lives on the lake's shore and knows its secrets(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Something Wicca This Way Comes. The first season of the supernatural US drama about a family of good witches with powerful magical abilities, starring Shannen Doherty, Holly Marie Combs and Alyssa Milano, comes to E4. After losing her job, Phoebe returns to San Francisco to live with her older sisters, Prue and Piper. During their first night together in their grandmother's house, Phoebe finds a mysterious old text called The Book of Shadows and recites an incantation from it that leaves the three siblings with remarkable powers(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: I've Got You Under My Skin
programme.desc: I've Got You Under My Skin. Piper has difficulty getting used to her unfamiliar new powers. Phoebe could become the next victim of a demon who poses as a photographer to steal the youthfulness of beautiful women. Prue faces relationship complications with Andy when she gets a job at an auction house(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Thank You for Not Morphing. The sisters' father makes a surprise return, but his motives appear to be less than admirable. A trio of shape-shifters also prove problematic(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: The Great Escapist. Clues about the final trail to stop Crowley's evil plan point Sam and Dean towards an all but deserted town, where a special resident awaits them(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Clip Show. Sam and Dean reunite with Castiel and discover a film in the Men of Letters files that could be the key to the third trial. Meanwhile, Crowley digs into Sam and Dean's past(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sacrifice. Buckle up for an action-packed season finale as Sam and Dean come face to face with their enemy Crowley in their final bid to seal the gates of hell forever(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: I Think I'm Gonna Like It Here
programme.desc: I Think I'm Gonna Like It Here. The ninth season of the US fantasy drama comes to E4 as demon hunters Sam and Dean Winchester (Jared Padalecki and Jensen Ackles) combat more supernatural forces. When they were boys, they lost their mother to a mysterious and demonic force. Subsequently, their father raised them to be soldiers in the war against evil. The brothers take to the road in their '67 Chevy Impala to do battle in a world now inhabited by thousands of newly arrived, powerful paranormal beings. But a dark secret hangs over Dean's head, and he might have finally crossed the line in order to protect his brother. In the first episode, Sam must fight with Death, and Dean sends out a call for help to the angels but gets a lethal response from the fallen legion. Meanwhile, Castiel learns what it means to be human. Also starring Misha Collins and Mark Sheppard(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Monster in the Closet. A social worker's remains are found, but evidence suggests the victim had been dead for months before the body was dumped in a park, and the case gets even more twisted when it's linked to a serial killer known for desecrating corpses. Meanwhile, Booth and Aubrey hope a behavioral analyst can provide some clues about the murderer; and Cam tries to sort out her romantic life(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Last Shot at a Second Chance
programme.desc: The Last Shot at a Second Chance. The murder of an ex-con who was living in a halfway house, but vanished, is investigated, and a suspect is linked to Booth. Meanwhile, Brennan is called to testify about her assault of an unarmed individual during a past case, which could result in a suspension; Aubrey and Jessica miss another chance for a first kiss; and the rift widens between Hodgins and Angela(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Fight in the Fixer. A private investigator's body is found frozen in ice after being thrown in the Potomac, and the investigation reveals that the victim was a fixer who had a long list of enemies. Meanwhile, Aubrey learns shocking information about his father(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Strike in the Chord. A body found in a rat lab at Lynwood University turns out to be the head of a male a cappella group who recently ejected one of their best singers. Meanwhile, Booth hopes to go on a summer holiday with Parker; a new intern joins the Jeffersonian; and Aubrey's university experience becomes a topic of interest(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Secret in the Service. A Secret Service agent's body is discovered by an inebriated university student on the eve of a presidential visit, but Booth is blindsided when the agency refuses his help with the case. Meanwhile, Brennan won't let the flu keep her from work even though Dr Colin Fisher has returned to the Jeffersonian to lead the investigation; and Hodgins attempts a risky experiment to change his life(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Movie in the Making. programme.title: Supernatural

Dorothy became trapped in the web years ago to stop the witch from finding the key that would open the gate that connected their world to Oz(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dog Dean Afternoon. Sam and Dean investigate two gruesome murders and realise that a German shepherd witnessed both deaths, so they use a spell that allows Dean to communicate with the dog. Unfortunately, the spell comes with unexpected side effects(n)

programme.desc: The Head in the Abutment. The death of a professional hockey player is investigated after his headless corpse is found in a river, and Booth's love of the sport proves to be an asset in the case, but it also reunites him with an old rival and puts him back on the ice(n)

programme.title: Bones

Meanwhile, Cam clashes with her sister when she arrives in town to help with her wedding plans(n)

programme.title: Bones

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Nightmare Within the Nightmare. In the Season 11 finale, the search for the Puppeteer, a serial killer who turns his victims into marionettes, continues, but Brennan can't shake her guilt of failing to catch the perpetrator due to her brief period of retirement(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Pilot. Temperance (Emily Deschanel) is called in by the FBI to help on a case and identifies the body of a missing intern who was involved with a married senator. Seeley: David Boreanaz. Zack: Eric Millegan. Ken Thompson: Sam Trammell. Oliver Laurier: Chris Conner. Sen. Bethlehem: Larry Poindexter. Hodgins: TJ Thyne. Angela: Michaela Conlin. Goodman: Jonathan Adams(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Man in the SUV. Was he a terrorist or was he framed? The forensic and detective duo investigate the case of a suspected suicide bomber(n)

programme.desc: The vampire slayer teams up with the undead to take down a band of mutant bloodsuckers in this sequel. Blade and his team join up with his arch nemesis to defeat a race of super-vampires called Reapers, who hunt vampires and humans indiscriminately(n)

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes returns in the final Blade film as the eponymous vampire slayer. Half-human, half-vampire himself, he is joined by Abigail Whistler and Hannibal King for the final confrontation. The Vampire Nation have found Dracula and with his DNA, they will be able to operate by day as well as night. David Goyer's smart horror movie sees the two sides meet in the final confrontation that will decide who rules Earth(n)

programme.title: Blade II
